description:
Kong hero jumps, gets coins and fights monster enemies using his golden stick and machine gun bullets.

Help Kong Hero move, jump and fight different enemies and bosses in four worlds today!

[Features]
- Four worlds with 45 different challenging levels
- Colourful scenes and relaxing music
- Choose Kong Hero or Hunter as the main character
- Simple and exciting gameplay

[Items]
- Banana: strengthening the health of the hero
- Peach: Add one orb
- Coin: Use coins to buy more lives or orbs

[Advice]
- The hero can use a double jump in the air or on a wall
- The hero can jump on enemies to kill them
- Break bricks to get bananas, peaches and coins
- Use bullets to kill enemies as they appear
name: Kong Hero!
